channel.title: Questions - Hexx [Album]
channel.description:
So, I came out with this new album recently ( https://soundcloud.com/hexx-official/sets/questions ) and I wanted to know. What are your favorite song/songs from it?
(Personally, I’m very proud of the me and @Peregrihn collab. Also, is that a lizard in my boot was very different and pretty compared to the rest of the album. Kind of a relaxer)

item.title: Questions - Hexx [Album]
item.dc:creator: PietervanBoven
item.description:
The beat and the dreamy melody are really nice together! The transitions are also well executed! The screaming synth seemed a bit off, because in my opninion it doesn’t really fit with the vibe of this track.

Great track, though!

Read full topic

item.description:
What did you think of Changing With The Leaves? Hexx am I did that together

item.title: Questions - Hexx [Album]
item.dc:creator: PietervanBoven
item.description:
Wow! I really like this album.

Favorite Tracks:

  • Is that a lizard in my boot? : The old school beat and piano flows so wel together.

  • What type of pie is this?: The trappy beat in combination with that xylophone really creates an awesome atmosphere.

  • Would you recommend Nutella? : I like the high-pitched melody and the bassline a lot. I also like the rides you put in there.

As you can see I like some of the more chill tracks on this album. The more agressive tracks were good, but sometimes they got a bit too much for me.

Great album!

Read full topic
